description: Jay Rising"Slick-Dick"Ht: 6'1" WT: 185lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0)Mitch Vaughn"The Machine"Ht: 5'10" WT: 205lbsSeason W/L record (1-0) Muscled hunk Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn returns to Naked Kombat. After defeating "The Wrecking-Ball" Rich Kelly, The Machine has bulked up almost twenty extra pounds of pure muscle to ensure his dominancy. His contendor is Jay "Slick-Dick" Rising, a badass newcomer with plenty of attitude to not care about his opponents larger size. He just thinks The Machine is big for nothing, all muscle no brains. Both studs fight to exhaustion through three rounds to determine who wins the right to fuck. Will Slick-Dick prove that size doesn't matter, or will The Machine teach him a hard lesson in sexual domination? Either way, someone's ass is getting fucked!
title: Jay "Slick-Dick" Rising vs Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn
